parse.title: List of most-viewed online trailers in the first 24 hours

text.*:
This list of most-viewed online trailers and teasers contains the top 20 movie and television trailers that received the most views within 24 hours of release across the world. The trailer views are generated from different online platforms such as Facebook, Twitter and YouTube.

Top trailers[edit]

  Indicates a trailer for a television series.
Rank Video name Views (millions)* Release date Ref(s)
1. Avengers: Infinity War – Official Trailer 230.0 November 29, 2017 [1]
2. It – Official Teaser Trailer 197.0 March 29, 2017 [2]
3. Avengers: Infinity War – Official Trailer #2 179.0 March 16, 2018 [3]
4. The Fate of the Furious – Official Trailer 139.0 December 11, 2016 [2]
5. Thor: Ragnarok – Official Teaser Trailer 136.0 April 10, 2017 [4]
6. Beauty and the Beast – Official Trailer 127.6 November 14, 2016 [5]
7. Star Wars: The Last Jedi – Trailer (Official) 120.1 October 9, 2017 [6]
8. Fifty Shades Darker – Trailer (Official) 114.0 September 13, 2016 [7]
9. Incredibles 2 – Official Teaser Trailer 113.0 November 18, 2017 [8]
10. Star Wars: The Force Awakens – Trailer (Official) 112.0 October 19, 2015 [9]
11. Captain Marvel – Official Teaser Trailer 109.0 September 18, 2018 [10]
12. Captain America: Civil War – Trailer #2 (Official) 94.7 March 10, 2016 [11]
13. Transformers: The Last Knight – Official Teaser 93.6 December 5, 2016 [12]
14. Beauty and the Beast – Official Teaser 91.4 May 23, 2016 [13]
15. Black Panther – Teaser Trailer 89.0 June 9, 2017 [14]
16. Star Wars: The Force Awakens – Teaser #2 88.0 April 16, 2015 [9]
17. Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 – Official Teaser 81.0 December 3, 2016 [15]
18. Venom – Official Trailer 64.3 April 23, 2018 [16]
19. Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom – Official Trailer 64.0 December 7, 2017 [17]
20. Captain America: Civil War – Trailer #1 61.0 November 24, 2015 [18]

*The number of views accumulated in the video's first 24 hours.

See also[edit]

  • List of most-viewed online videos in the first 24 hours
  • List of most-viewed YouTube videos
  • List of most-viewed Vevo videos
  • List of viral videos

References[edit]

  1. ^ Couch, Aaron (30 November 2017). "Captain America's 'Infinity War' Beard Was Most Popular Part of Trailer". The Hollywood Reporter. Archived from the original on 30 November 2017. Retrieved 30 November 2017. 
  2. ^ a b "It trailer sets all-time viewing record, bulldozing The Fate of the Furious". Entertainment Weekly. Archived from the original on 2017-03-31. 
  3. ^ "New 'Avengers: Infinity War' Trailer Nabs Third-Biggest Debut Ever". The Hollywood Reporter. 20 March 2018. Archived from the original on 21 March 2018. 
  4. ^ "'Thor: Ragnarok' Trailer Is Marvel and Disney's Most Watched Ever in 24 Hours". The Hollywood Reporter. Archived from the original on 2017-04-12. 
  5. ^ "Beauty and the Beast trailer beats Fifty Shades, Star Wars for new record". Entertainment Weekly. Archived from the original on 2016-11-15. 
  6. ^ "Thank You for Supporting Star Wars: The Last Jedi". StarWars.com. Archived from the original on 2017-10-12. 
  7. ^ "The Fifty Shades Darker trailer set a new record for views in its first day". The Hollywood Reporter. Archived from the original on 2016-09-16. 
  8. ^ Lawrence, Derek (20 November 2017). "'Incredibles 2' is the most-viewed animated movie trailer ever". Entertainment Weekly. Archived from the original on 1 December 2017. Retrieved 30 November 2017. 
  9. ^ a b "Star Wars trailer viewed more than 112m times in 24 hours". The Guardian. Archived from the original on 2017-04-18. 
  10. ^ "Marvel Studios on Twitter: "Thank you Marvel fans for your support! 109M global views for the #CaptainMarvel trailer in 24 hours. Higher. Further. Faster."". Twitter. Archived from the original on 2018-09-19. 
  11. ^ "Captain America: Civil War trailer nears 100 million views in 24 hours". Entertainment Weekly. Archived from the original on 2016-03-12. 
  12. ^ "'Transformers: The Last Knight' Trailer Seizes 100M Views Online". Deadline Hollywood. Archived from the original on 2017-04-12. 
  13. ^ "Beauty and the Beast breaks trailer views record set by Star Wars". The Guardian. Archived from the original on 2016-05-26. 
  14. ^ "'Black Panther' Teaser Trailer Racks Up 89M Views in First 24 Hours". Archived from the original on 2017-06-13. 
  15. ^ "Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2 Trailer Becomes Second Highest Viewed Teaser After One Day". MSN. Archived from the original on 2016-12-20. 
  16. ^ https://screenrant.com/venom-movie-trailer-views/
  17. ^ Web Desk, Express. "New trailers: Black Mirror, Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom, and more". Archived from the original on December 10, 2017. 
  18. ^ Kuegler, Thomas (30 November 2015). "The 'Captain America' Trailer Received More Views In 24 Hours Than The Number Of People Living In Italy". Inquisitr. Archived from the original on 2 February 2016. Retrieved January 30, 2016.
